text: Snehasindooram is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by Krishnan Munnadu and starring Nedumudi Venu and Ambika in the lead roles. ==Cast== *Shankar as Krishnanunny * Kaviyoor Ponnamma as Sarasvathy * Nedumudi Venu as Sankaran * Premkumar as Aravindan * Ambika (New) as Uma * Jagannadha Varma as Anandan * Keerthi Gopinath as Urmila * Saikumar as Sudhakaran * Vinduja Menon as Ujjala * Kavya Madhavan as Anjali * Sukumari as Aravindan's mother *Shivaji as Keshavan *Thodupuzha Vasanthy as Sharada *Bobby Kottarakkara as Gopi *Seetha as Valsala * Ponnamma Babu as Nirmala * Sainuddin as Narikulam Narayanan * Devan as Rajeevan *Bindu Varappuzha as Devayani ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Snehasindooram
